bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld compact race design, 1.5" integrated headset

Tektro cold-forged, dual pivot w/ cartridge pads
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
Forged alloy Hub, sealed bearings, 28 hole, for J bend round spokes
Forged aluminum, 32h double sealed ball bearings, cassette, QR
Specialized All Condition, 700x23c, aramid bead, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Specialized All Condition, 700x23c, aramid bead, 60TPI, w/ Flak Jacket protection
Body Geometry Riva Road, w/ steel rails
Specialized Elite, carbon wrapped alloy, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
